awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 33 wins & 14 nominations.

fullplot: East Germany, the year 1989: A young man protests against the regime. His mother watches the police arresting him and suffers a heart attack and falls into a coma. Some months later, the GDR does not exist anymore and the mother awakes. Since she has to avoid every excitement, the son tries to set up the GDR again for her in their flat. But the world has changed a lot.
plot: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.
title: Good Bye Lenin!

tomatoes.consensus: Funny and poignant social critique of German reunification.
